bbe_specialisations: Prerequisite for admission to courses from the Specializations is the successful completion of at least 42 ECTS Credits of the main program phase except the 'Academic Skills'.
wire_ba: Prerequisite for the assessment of the Bachelor Thesis is the positive completion of all courses of the STEOP, the CBK, and 'Standards rechtswissenschaftlichen Arbeitens und Zitierens'.
